page.title: 01WITLEY GAZETTEER
page.content: The village of{Witley}is situated 4km to the south west of Godalming in Surrey.The original village was a linear development along the A283, Petworth Road.In 1985 however,most of the residential area of the village lies to the west of the main road.Many of the houses have been built since the turn of the century. The area around Witley is very picturesque.Rolling farmland, old established woodlands and heathlands combine to form a Wealden landscape punctuated by old buildings of brick and local Bargate stone. Once in the area,it is best to explore the locality on foot,using the well maintained footpaths.Away from the main roads it is easy to escape from the noise to enjoy the flora and fauna of the Surrey countryside.
